title: langage change for browser developer tools
content:
changing the language in the settings does not change the language in browser developer tools. I would like the language in the browser developer tools to be English.

I have attached a screenshot. The red zone is always in French. I would like it to be in English. However, I changed the language in the settings. Thanks in advance
creator: torguephilippe

title: Frozen
content: So. Today while i was attempting to uninstall some PUPs specificly mcafee if you count it as one. So i went to uninstall and reinstall firefox so i could remove mcafee web protector from my firefox addons but when doing so. I now cannot click on reload. Go back. Go forward. Nor can i use the search bar as when i do so. It fails to load. I've tried fixing it with other methods having a closely the same problem but they have failed and now i am stuck unable to interract with firefox.
creator: lokithekid8908

title: How to unblock email addresses that I had blocked before
content:
How to unblock email addresses (as senders) that I had blocked before? Is there a blocked listing' email addresses that I had blocked before but now I want to unblock. Its the opposite effect of.blocking of senders / email addresses. Thank you.

Steve Koopman

title: why does captcha keep dropping out and sending message, "can't contact captchka"
content: I am really tired of having to download the "captcha" files over and over. What am I doing wrong?

title: Pinned Tabs doesn't work at windows 11
content: When I use windows 10, pinned tabs were worked properly. But in windows 11 I pinned tab at mozila firefox. I quit with my some of tabs are pinned. But when I again start firefox my pinned tabs are gone. This is so disappointing to me. I didn't face this type of problem at windows 10.
creator: bmfahimreza

title: Videos Not Working`
content:
No video players work with Firefox but they work fine in Chrome

I have the latest version downloaded, I have tried debugging, private windows, cache and cookie clear, reinstalled/reset firefox, restarted my computer, updated my GPU drivers, changed every setting such as autoplay, hardware acceleration etc., disabled all enhancements, and more.

Nothing fixes this. I get error codes on every site i try, twitch, streamable, etc. None play videos.
creator: boe44178

title: possible bug
content: My device has acted strange in that sometimes the browsing data is not mine and the browser actually said target client! What would cause this?
creator: welder411
